Class MainViewAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<QuestionList>
        • ca.ualberta.cmput301f14t16.easya.View.MainViewAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class MainViewAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<QuestionList>
    An extension of the view adapter class, used for displaying lists of Question objects.
    Author:
    Cauani
